content:
Alright, no worries, I understand,
But before I go, just give me a hand,
Hear me out, just for a sec,
'Cause this message is worth more than any check,

Jehovah's love is pure and true,
And it's something that I wanna share with you,
It'll bring you peace, it'll bring you light,
It'll make your life just feel right,

So even though you're not interested,
In the toaster, just let me insist,
That you take a moment and hear me out,
You never know, it could change your route.

I understand if you're not ready,
But just keep it in mind, it's already been said,
Jehovah's love is something real,
And it's something that you can feel.

Alright, I'll let you be,
But know that I'm always here,
If you ever want to hear more,
Just give me a knock on your door.
